casebody.data:
Thomas E. MURRAY, Jr., as Receiver of Interborough Rapid Transit Company, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. The TRANSIT COMMISSION, METROPOLITAN DIVISION, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SERVICE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Defendant-Appellant. No. 5. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 12, 1939. John J. Curtin, of New York City (John J. Curtin, Joseph H. Choate, Jr., Wesley S. Sawyer, and Winfield S. Palmer, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Joseph H. Choate, Jr., of New York City, for appellant. Miller, Owen, Otis & Bailly, of New York City (Carl M. Owen, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed on opinion below, 11 F.Supp. 27.
